import React, { Component } from 'react' import {MdLocalShipping} from 'react-icons/md' import {GrCreditCard} from 'react-icons/gr' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' export default class Checkout extends Component { constructor(){ super(); this.state = { name: "", surname: "", address: "", city: "", state: "", email: "" } } handleChanges = event => { const target = event.target; const value = target.value; const name = target.name; this.setState({ [name] : value }) } render() { return ( <>

) } }
